data: Initializing memory.. Checking batteries.. Turning systems on.. Beep bop, beep bop..
What do you need me to do?
What can I do for you?
I can't find any article related to that. Try a simpler one.
Beep bop, didn't find any article relating to what you mentioned.
What do you want me to look up and search for you?
What do you want me to search?
Alright, enter something and I'll search it right away:
what information do you want me to search?
You are using an older version of me. My master updated me. Updating... Beep, bop. bop. bop, beep bop. Version Updated :)
Error, error, error. Just kidding :P. I have received an update in my system. Updating... Version Updated!
Beeeeep boooop, my system experienced a chill. Update incomming... Installing.. Version Updated..
Wait amigo, my creator updated me.. Installing system updates... Version Updated..
beep, beep, beep. beep, beep, bop. beep, bop, beep, bop. beep, bop, beep, bop. beep. beep, beep, beep. beep, beep, beep.
I can look up for ':title:' instead
